MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the CW5 postcode area of Nantwich, affecting properties in Station View and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  9:01PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a faulty piece of equipment and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:30AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:02PM on 26th February 2021.
